meanings.definition: A period of one hundred years.
meanings.sent1: The history book discussed the centennials of important events.
meanings.sent2: The town celebrated its centennials with a big parade.
meanings.sent3: At the centennials party, everyone dressed up in old-fashioned clothes.
meanings.sent4: The centennials of the ancient civilization were marked by grand monuments.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed artifacts from various centennials throughout history.

meanings.sent1: The company commemorated its centennials with a special event.
meanings.sent2: The couple celebrated their centennials with a romantic dinner.
meanings.sent3: For their centennials, they recreated their first date from a hundred years ago.
meanings.sent4: The centennials of their marriage were a testament to their enduring love.
meanings.sent5: The centennials of the school were marked by alumni coming together to reminisce.
